description: A female Gun-Swordsman who attempts to kill Melan, believing he betrayed their kind. Her sword is a rapier, and she launches disk weapons which can be used to reflect her lasers. She has obseviely and saicotic desire to kill. She even went as far as to come to earth with the momomakia ark and started to attack people. She is later sealed in her capsule but Marin let her out to talk to her telling melan would have never taken creis endless it was a good reason that should talk to him and find out why so she could resolve things with him. She really a bad person she showed that when she saved Moe by giving her the antidote to the growing momomakia that was inside her.When they found the creis marin capsal she attacked melan but he then he defeated her and she started to break down and cry in his arm saying that she has always loved him like a brother.He then tells her everything about why he took creis and Erin believes him but she begins questing about what`s really happening on brigadoon but her and melan are later captured by the renegade brought back to brigadoon. She along with pyon later help melan and marin fight the renegade but is later killed by them as well. Her body is brought to the pasca ritural and everyone is brought back to life.
name: Erin Garnet
